程序包 org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    GatewayFilterFactory
    GatewayFilterFactory 工厂类。
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AddRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactory
    Filter：添加指定请求 Header 为指定值。
    AddRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    AddRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    AddRequestParameterGatewayFilterFactory
    AddRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactory Filter：指定RequestParameter为新的request spring: cloud: gateway: routes: # ===================================== - id: add_request_parameter_route uri: http://example.org filters: - AddRequestParameter=foo, bar
    AddRequestParameterGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    AddRequestParameterGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    AddResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory  
    GatewayFilters  
    HystrixGatewayFilterFactory
    Filter：熔断网关过滤器工厂 HystrixGatewayFilter 使用 Hystrix ，实现基于 Route 级别的熔断功能。
    HystrixGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    HystrixGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    PrefixPathGatewayFilterFactory
    给path添加前置prefix
    RedirectToGatewayFilterFactory
    spring: cloud: gateway: routes: # ===================================== - id: prefixpath_route uri: http://example.org filters: - RedirectTo=302, http://www.iocoder.cn 将响应重定向到指定 URL ，并设置响应状态码为指定 Status 。
    RedirectToGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    RedirectToGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    RemoveNonProxyHeadersGatewayFilterFactory
    移除请求 Proxy 相关的 Header
    RemoveNonProxyHeadersGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    RemoveNonProxyHeadersGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    RemoveRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactory
    移除header
    RemoveRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    RemoveRequestHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    RemoveResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory
    移除header中的东西
    RemoveResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    RemoveResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    RequestRateLimiterGatewayFilterFactory
    RequestRateLimiterGatewayFilter 使用【Redis + Lua】实现分布式限流。
    RequestRateLimiterGatewayFilterFactoryTests
    see https://gist.github.com/ptarjan/e38f45f2dfe601419ca3af937fff574d#file-1-check_request_rate_limiter-rb-L36-L62
    RequestRateLimiterGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    RewritePathGatewayFilterFactory
    根据配置的正则表达式 regexp ，使用配置的 replacement 重写请求 Path，有点类似于{@see Module ngx_http_rewrite_module}
    RewritePathGatewayFilterFactoryIntegrationTests  
    RewritePathGatewayFilterFactoryIntegrationTests.TestConfig  
    RewritePathGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    SecureHeadersGatewayFilterFactory
    添加响应 Secure 相关的 Header,默认值在SecureHeadersProperties中配置 四个常见的安全头部：@see "https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000000419263" and @see "https://blog.appcanary.com/2017/http-security-headers.html"
    SecureHeadersGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    SecureHeadersGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    SecureHeadersProperties  
    SetPathGatewayFilterFactory
    uriTemplateVariables重写path？
    SetPathGatewayFilterFactoryIntegrationTests  
    SetPathGatewayFilterFactoryIntegrationTests.TestConfig  
    SetPathGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    SetResponseGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    SetResponseGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig  
    SetResponseHeaderGatewayFilterFactory
    takes name and value parameters.
    SetStatusGatewayFilterFactory
    状态码修改 spring: cloud: gateway: routes: # ===================================== - id: setstatusstring_route uri: http://example.org filters: - SetStatus=BAD_REQUEST - id: setstatusint_route uri: http://example.org filters: - SetStatus=401
    SetStatusGatewayFilterFactoryTests  
    SetStatusGatewayFilterFactoryTests.TestConfig
